amendment.description: Amendment provides $1 million in funding for the expansion of the Shadow Wolves which are part of CBP and are located on the Tohono O'odham reservation.
amendment.purpose: An amendment to increase by transfer for U.S. Immigration and Customs Enforcement by $1 million.

vote.text: On agreeing to the King (IA) amendment (A017) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the King (IA) amendment (A017) Agreed to by voice vote.
House amendment offered/reported by: Amendment (A017) offered by Mr. King (IA).
